metadata.title: CVE-2021-30593 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds read in Tab Strip in Google Chrome prior to 92.0.4515.131allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto perform an out of bounds memory read via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
